Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You looking for me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Take a seat. I wanted to talk about the retreat operation and some other news.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...There's no need.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You have the right to know.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are you worried that I know too much?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...Our investigation shows Cyril was the leader of the Punishing Rebels. Not sure if he was the only leader, or if there were others.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But we are certain that he had everything planned from the moment he approached the operation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "They aren't a significant threat to Babylonia yet. But considering how little time they had to prepare, and how quickly they assembled with limited resources...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'And their ability to plan and execute such an ambush...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "All I can say is, thanks to you, we didn't lose Halcyon 2.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That group mostly consists of ex-soldiers of the old government who aren't satisfied with the operation commands we have now. They have already left since Cyril exposed himself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'We managed to kill or capture some of them, but a lot had escaped and are still active.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'If we do nothing, they may grow into a large threat.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Seeing your contribution to the last operation, HQ decided to officially grant you access to Babylonia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'You will be transferred to the Babylonia protection team and head to another launch base...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Actually, I also wanted to talk to you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I would like to leave Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Watanabe? You know you will face a court-martial for that, don't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've made up my mind. And you know, once I've decided to do something, nothing can stop me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But why? Because of Cyril? Or...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Stop pretending like you care. I'm going to contact the ground military bases that have fallen out of the organization. Is that what you expected?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...As a military man, I understand how you feel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Well, I would kindly ask you for a favor then.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'But you do know Constructs are important assets of Babylonia, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I know there\'s one shuttle heading to the ground today, shipping "scrapped" Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'As for your "asset"... I will return it to where it came from.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But you probably know about my very first frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...That frame will allow you to easily enter the shuttle without being discovered.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "(Lets out a bitter smile) But you know I wasn't talking about the frames.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Anyway, I understand. Last but not least...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Watanabe, on behalf of Babylonia, I would like to thank you for all you have done.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Thank you for your service for Babylonia and the entire humanity.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Well... Till we meet again.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I hope that we're both alive till then.", 4: '2'}
